import React,{useState}from"react";import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from"axios";import"../styles/log.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/login/",{username,password});if(response.data.success){// –°–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω—è–µ–º JWT —Ç–æ–∫–µ–Ω—ã
localStorage.setItem("access_token",response.data.access);localStorage.setItem("refresh_token",response.data.refresh);localStorage.setItem("isAuthenticated","true");navigate("/main");}else{window.showErrorPopup("–ù–µ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω—ã–π –ª–æ–≥–∏–Ω –∏–ª–∏ –ø–∞—Ä–æ–ª—å!");}}catch(err){console.error(err);window.showErrorPopup("–û—à–∏–±–∫–∞ —Å–æ–µ–¥–∏–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å —Å–µ—Ä–≤–µ—Ä–æ–º!");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Lroot",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Lleft_box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"Lbutton_back",children:"\u2B05\uFE0F Back"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Lcenter_box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Lbig_login",children:"\uD83D\uDC4BLog in"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Lcenter_box_child",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Lenter_y_data",children:"Enter your data:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"Lcenter_inbox",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"Lform",onSubmit:handleLogin,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Llogin_text",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Enter name",className:"Linput",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Llogin_text",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Enter password",className:"Linput",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"Lenter_button",children:"Log in \u27A1\uFE0F"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{className:"singin",to:"/register",children:"\uD83D\uDC49Sing in\uD83D\uDC48"})]})]})]});};export default Login;
